parameter.name: objectKey
parameter.description: The name to give for the newly created object.

parameter.name: contentMD5
parameter.description: The base64-encoded 128-bit MD5 digest of the message according to RFC 1864.

parameter.name: uploadId
parameter.description: This specifies the ID of the initiated multipart upload.

parameter.name: partNumber
parameter.description: This specifies the number or the index of the uploaded tag.

parameter.name: filePath
parameter.description: Path of the file to be uploaded.

parameter.name: sseCustomerAlgorithm
parameter.description: The algorithm to use to when encrypting the object (for example, AES256).

parameter.name: sseCustomerKey
parameter.description: The customer-provided encryption key for Amazon S3 to use in encrypting data.

parameter.name: sseCustomerKeyMD5
parameter.description: The 128-bit MD5 digest of the encryption key according to RFC 1321.

parameter.name: requestPayer
parameter.description: Confirms that the requester knows that they will be charged for the request.
